DOC.detailed_description: This study examine impact school support structural intervention , test among adolescent orphan Siaya District , Nyanza Province , Kenya . Aims propose study : 1 ) To experimentally test whether provide comprehensive school support Kenyan orphan boys girl reduce school dropout , reduce sexual risk behavior , prevent HIV/HSV-2 infection ; 2 ) To conduct process evaluation implementation program ; 3 ) To conduct comparative cost effectiveness analysis , specify intervention 's cost return investment evidence cost per unit improvement primary outcome school enrollment , delay sexual debut prevention risk behavior HIV/HSV-2 infection , well gain health-related quality life .
